onyomiExamples.meaning: (logical) true, regular, 10^40, ten thousand undecillion, original, positive, greater than zero, thesis (in dialectics)
greater (of equal court ranks), upper, senior, director (highest of the four administrative positions of the ritsuryo period), chief, exactly, precisely
New Year (esp. first three days), first month of the year, January

kunyomiExamples.meaning: right, correct, proper, righteous, just, honest, truthful, lawful
conducting oneself properly, right conduct, doing the right thing
to correct, to rectify, to reform, to amend, to redress, to straighten (one's posture, collar, etc.), to adjust
to ascertain, to confirm, to verify, to make sure of
exactly, surely, certainly, just, right then, just then, at that moment, just (about to), on the verge (of doing or happening), duly, naturally
